title: Jerry Garcia Band - 1978-03-17 - Capitol Theater in Passaic, NJ
description:
Jerry Garcia Band
Capitol Theater
Passaic, NJ
3/17/78 Early Show


Barry Glassberg's master FM reel > TEAC X2000R playback > Nakamichi
NR200 Dolby Unit > Tascam DA-40 (master DAT) > Tascam CDRW700 master
CD > 1 CD > HP 9350i extraction (EAC v0.9 beta 4) > sector boundary
verification (shntool v1.01) > .shn encoding (mkwACT v0.97 beta 1).
A > D by Mark Cohen, EAC > SHN by Joe Jupille.



Set One  45:48
01. DJ talk, Introduction & Tuning [2:03]
02. How Sweet It Is [7:13] [1:49]
03. Catfish John [10:39] [1:33]
04. Simple Twist of Fate [11:28] [0:35]
05. Second That Emotion [10:13] [0:15]


Set Two  38:22
06. Crowd & Tuning [1:30]
07. They Love Each Other [8:43] [1:48]
08. Gomorrah [6:25] [1:09]
09. Mystery Train [9:03] [0:38]


--- Encore ---
10. //Cats Under the Stars [#7:28] [0:38]




Notes/Flaws:
- There is a touch of fuzzy distortion, but overall this sounds very nice.
- d2t05 Cats cuts in, not much missing.
